title: Cornelius Cooper
text:
Cornelius Cooper (born January 10, 1947) is a former <a href="American%20football">American football</a> player and coach. He was the 13th head football coach at <a href="Prairie%20View%20A%26amp%3BM%20University">Prairie View A&M University</a> in <a href="Prairie%20View%2C%20Texas">Prairie View, Texas</a> and he held that position for two seasons, from 1980 until 1981. His record at Prairie View was 4–16.
Cooper played <a href="offensive%20tackle">offensive tackle</a> at Prairie View and was selected in the 11th round (280th overall pick) of the in <a href="1968%20NFL%20Draft">1968 NFL Draft</a> by the <a href="Miami%20Dolphins">Miami Dolphins</a>.
Cooper later taught in the <a href="West%20Orange-Cove%20Consolidated%20Independent%20School%20District">West Orange-Cove Consolidated Independent School District</a>.
